mapper.select: SELECT td.domain_seq , td.domain_name , tl.lto_seq , tl.lto_name , ts.sto_seq , ts.sto_name , DATE_FORMAT(ts.sto_status_ch_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS sto_status_ch_dt , CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(ts.sto_status_ch_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') > #{reportEndDt } THEN 'ING' ELSE ts.sto_status_cd END AS sto_status_cd FROM TB_DOMAIN td LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LTO tl ON td.domain_seq = tl.domain_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STO ts ON tl.lto_seq = ts.lto_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STO_POINT tsp ON ts.sto_seq = tsp.sto_seq WHERE td.children_seq = #{childrenSeq } AND ts.sto_status_cd IN ('CMP', 'ING') AND DATE_FORMAT(tsp.point_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{reportStartDt } AND #{reportEndDt } GROUP BY ts.sto_seq ORDER BY td.domain_sort_order, tl.lto_sort_order, ts.sto_sort_order

SELECT mq.domain_seq , mq.domain_name , SUM(CASE WHEN mq.sto_status_cd IN ('CMP', 'ING') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sto_ing_cnt , SUM(CASE WHEN mq.sto_status_cd IN ('CMP') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sto_cmp_cnt FROM ( SELECT td.domain_seq , td.domain_name , td.domain_sort_order , tl.lto_seq , tl.lto_name , tl.lto_sort_order , ts.sto_seq , ts.sto_name , ts.sto_sort_order , DATE_FORMAT(ts.sto_status_ch_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS sto_status_ch_dt , DATE_FORMAT(tsp.point_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS point_reg_dt , CASE WHEN ts.sto_status_ch_dt > tsp.point_reg_dt THEN 'ING' WHEN tsp.point_reg_dt IS NULL AND DATE_FORMAT(ts.sto_status_ch_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') NOT BETWEEN #{reportStartDt } AND #{reportEndDt } THEN 'WIT' ELSE ts.sto_status_cd END AS sto_status_cd FROM TB_DOMAIN td LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LTO tl ON td.domain_seq = tl.domain_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STO ts ON tl.lto_seq = ts.lto_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT sto_seq, MAX(point_reg_dt) AS point_reg_dt FROM TB_STO_POINT WHERE DATE_FORMAT(point_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{reportStartDt } AND #{reportEndDt } GROUP BY sto_seq ) tsp ON ts.sto_seq = tsp.sto_seq WHERE td.children_seq = #{childrenSeq } ) mq GROUP BY mq.domain_seq ORDER BY mq.domain_sort_order
